wikipedia_page.main: Lawrence Allen (25 April 1921 – 16 December 2018) was a British racewalker who competed in the 1952 Summer Olympics. He competed at club level for City of Sheffield AC. He died in December 2018 at the age of 97.

link_mentions.page: Athletics at the 1952 Summer Olympics – Men's 10 kilometres walk
